title: [MAC] Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
body:
Dear fellow summoners and ROIT,

I have been playing with **LoL Mac client** for sometime now. It was working flawlessly as of yesterday and normally. Until, this morning I tried opening the client as usual, but I got an error "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information. ".  I have tried restarting my Mac several times, but it doesn't solve this problem. 

Could someone please help me solving this error


Cheers,

replies.body:
**UPDATE**

As far as this issue is concerned, I'm not the only one. There have been many other various posts on the forum regarding to this. I have found a temporary fix for those who stills stuck at opening the client
> 
So I have seen many people have issues with mac client just as I have been. I have managed a temporary fix that worked for me and should work for you.
go to finder > applications > right click league of legends and click show package contents > contents > LoL > RADS > projects > lol_patcher > releases > 0.0.0.2 > deploy > LOLPATCHER

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/rgUAEP4N-temporary-fix-to-unspecified-error-on-mac-client

- Credit to MormonMagic 

I can go as far as opening the client, but still unable to login. Stuck at the login screen.


Fix this please Riot

i did that and then i waited for the next day and poof OMG ITS WORKING so probably do it one day and then wait for the next day and the next day open it and let it patch then u can play it,its all about patience  Y(^^)Y

Bump - same problem here. Got it sometime last year as well, and fixed it by completely redownloading the game, which I'm unable to do now because the OCE's download link seems to be down. Trying MormonMagic's temporary fix for now.

RIOT THIS IS HAPPENING TO MUCH TO ME ITS SO ANNOYING FIX YOUR GAME MAN. I HAVE TRIED EVERYTHING EVEN UNINSTALL IM ON MY LAST THRED IM THINKING OF UNINSTALING AND NOT REINSTALL
 
FIX YOUR GAME 

(for mac's)

I'm having the same problem opening the client so I fell asleep and waited until the morning to see if I could get on so I called my friend on skype who has the same mac as me and we both tried to get on. It turns out that she could get on with no troubles but, when I tried to open the client it came up with the same thing... "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." Can anyone help me with this issue??

**UPDATE**

I can log onto the server now using the temporary fix method. However, I still haven't tested, playing yet. Probably won't be playing in a while. Lost the excitement to play. Thanks Riot. 

The client still can't be open with the normal method.
